introAnimation.circlesLandUnlocks: CirclesLand is here to unlock all our potential
introAnimation.introducing: Introducing the next generation of a fully opensource, digital and borderless country-as-a-service platform, starting with Circles a new universal basic income currency to secure our most basic needs.

mission.yourPassionIsTheMotor: Your passion is the motor into a thriving new economy empowering all
mission.byStarting: By starting to follow your passion and accepting Circles as payment for it, you create your own joyful space towards an eventful, manifold and fulfilled life for everyone.

steps.introducing: Introducing the next generation of your 100% opensource, digital and borderless country-as-a-service platform, unlocking your new Circles universal basic income to secure the most basic needs for all of us.
steps.createPassportDescription: While signing up you create a self-sovereign and portable identity passport.
steps.getInvitedDescription: To receive your very first personalized Circles you need to get invited by another citizen.
steps.unlockUbiDescription: Once you got successfully invited, you receive every month universal basic income in Circles.

email.title: Welcome to CirclesLand
email.description: A pleasure you found your way here. Please provide your email address to Sign-In.

terms_privacy.title: Terms & Privacy
terms_privacy.description:
CirclesLand is built on a blockchain, which by design is a transparent and permanent decentralized database. With your signup you agree that your profile, transactions and friend connections will be irrevocably public.

For details read our privacy policy & terms of service

strings.labelExportSeedphrase:
Your Secret Recovery Code is theonly key which can access your safe. It is your full responsibility to protect this code like a password.

If you loose it or forget it, all your money is lost forever.
strings.labelCheckSeedphrase: Keep in mind, everyone who knows your Secret Recovery Code can access all your funds! Did you store your Secret Recovery Code in a password manager or have you written it down on a paper, that you put into a secret place? Repeat your Secret Recovery Code

seedphrase.title:
READ CAREFULLY
Secret Recovery Code
seedphrase.description:
Your Secret Recovery Code is theonly keywhich can access your safe. It is yourfull responsibilitytoprotectthis code like apassword.

If you loose it or forget it, all yourmoney is lost forever.

seedphraseCheck.title: SAFE Code SECURELY
seedphraseCheck.description:
Keep in mind, everyone who knows your Secret Recovery Code can access all you money.

Please save your Secret Recovery Code in your notes (not secure), a password manager (secure) or write it down on a paper and put it in your safe (most secure).

createSafe.pleaseEnterSecretCode: Please enter your Secret Recovery Code.

editorContent.title: Connect or Create?
editorContent.description: Do you already have a circles Safe address or would you like to create one?

getInvite.htmlContext:
You're almost there.

To activate your citizenship you need to be invited.
Send your profile link to a CirclesLand citizen to unlock your basic income.

${profileLink}

If you don't know anybody who has Circles yet, ask nicely in our Discord if someone can activate your citizenship.

alternatively, unlock yourself and grow a new local community

editorContent.title: Log out
editorContent.description: Please enter your Secret Recovery Code to logout. If you haven't stored your Secret Recovery Code at a safe place yet, do it now and come back again later to log-out.

info.title: your lifetime is precious
info.description: So we make it count! Your passionate heart generates 24 Circles a day. Welcome to a world where your life time buys goods and services! Enjoy your freedom to spend your time however you want!
